name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Customer Engineer with a deep understanding of **data governance**, **data quality**, and **data privacy**, I bring 8+ years of experience in the software engineering realm, specializing in enterprise architecture and **Data Management**. My professional background combines technical prowess with effective project management, enabling me to execute value-based selling strategies and conduct comprehensive ROI and cost-benefit analyses. Skilled in engaging with clients and fostering collaboration, I utilize **Integration platforms** and **Databases** to enhance customer satisfaction and streamline processes. My foundational experience as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer allows me to leverage **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), **frontend frameworks** (Angular, Vue, React, Next.js), and **cloud platforms** (AWS, Azure) to design tailored solutions that are secure and efficient, driving business success in sectors such as e-commerce, finance, and healthcare.
